game_info.name: Motherload Clone
game_info.description: Mining game on Mars. Control drilling pod, extract valuable minerals underground, return to surface before fuel runs out, sell minerals, buy upgrades, dig deeper until reaching the planet's core.

core_loop.description: Drill underground collecting minerals -> Return to surface before fuel runs out -> Sell minerals at processor -> Buy fuel -> Upgrade equipment at shops -> Dig deeper -> Repeat

combat_profile.how_to_attack: N/A - mining game. Use arrow keys to move and drill. Down drills downward. Return to surface to sell minerals and refuel.
